usage.cn: 有些爱从一开始就注定会受伤。
usage.eng: When a cigar falls in love with a match，it's destined to be hurt.

usage.cn: 当香烟爱上火柴时,就注定受到伤害
usage.eng: When a cigarette falls in love with a match,it is destined to be hurt

usage.cn: 有些人成功，是因为他们命中注定要成功；但绝大部分人成功，是因为他们下定决心要成功！Graeme Clegg（格雷姆•克莱格）
usage.eng: Some people succeed because they are destined to, but most people succeed because they are determined to!
